author: apsallid
body:
#### PR description:

We update (@rovere , @felicepantaleo) the HGCalValidator package, anticipating the full deployment of TICL. In more detail: 

1. The package now can run through multiple input objects. The code was also restructured to avoid label dependent if statements that will lead to crash/problematic runs.
2. Removed contiguous and non contiguous histos from score. 
3. Removed cell association plots from multicluster section. 
4. Plotting script was updated removing the abovementioned plots. 
5. Work was rebased on top of the huge PR #28092. 

#### PR validation:

We tested the PR with TICL and without TICL customization. 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This is not a backport.
title: [HGCal] Updates on HGCalValidator
